channel.title: Move client login?
channel.description:
Hai, just been playing around with the gfx on this client but, i can't work out where to find the locations for the "Client login" thing. i'll post an SS so you can see what i mean.
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2j5jvuu.png[/img]
Any idea's? Thanks.

item.title: Move client login?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Change where it renders and the boundaries of the buttons, I haven’t seen a tutorial on this so I can’t link you to one I’m afraid.

Read full topic
